description: Mobile techniques used by Twitoor, ATT&CK software S0302 (v2.0)
name: Twitoor (S0302)

techniques.comment: [Twitoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0302) can hide its presence on the system.(Citation: ESET-Twitoor)
[Twitoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0302) can be controlled via Twitter.(Citation: ESET-Twitoor)
